Class GnuplotScatterplot

    ca.uqac.lif.cep.Duplicable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions.DuplicableFunction

    @Deprecated
public class GnuplotScatterplot
extends TwoDimensionalPlotFunction
    Generates a scatterplot from a ca.uqac.lif.cep.gnuplot.sets.Multiset of tuples.

      • m_otherHeaders

        protected java.lang.String[] m_otherHeaders
        Deprecated. 
        The names of the other columns. We store them into an array, as we cannot guarantee that every line of the input data will list them in the same order.

      • getColumnNames

        protected void getColumnNames(Multiset bag)
        Deprecated. 
        Fetches column names from an element (i.e. a tuple) from the bag. If m_fixedColumns is set to true, the method picks any tuple and fetches its columns. Otherwise, the method picks the largest tuple and fetches its columns.

        Warning: Gnuplot can handle a maximum of 7 columns, and segfaults when given more. To avoid that, this method limits itself to the first 7 column names it encounters and discards the rest.

        Parameters:
        bag - The data bag
